sub_fields.message: The title itself will be handled through the native WordPress page title. Use the font color option in the Block Options to control the text color, background color/image, etc.

sub_fields.instructions: Default field group, included with the theme. Consists of one WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) text editor.
